Are you in need of shared hosting plan?   
    

I can offer you 10GB Storage for as little as $10/year!  
 This special offer is available in both Phoenix, USA and Amsterdam, NL.
  
What more do you get for $10/year?    
100GB monthly bandwidth.   
SSL support via Lets Encrypt or Auto-SSL.    
No limits on email accounts, forwarders or aliases.     
No limits on sub-,  parked or addon domains.     
Softaculous - one-click installers. 
   
Friendly support!   
VAT included if ordering from within the EU.    
[Order Phoenix here](https://clients.mrvm.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=42)       
[Order Amsterdam here](https://clients.mrvm.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=43)
